identity.name: E1 Financial
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster design with Bloomberg Terminal density.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Use Monospace fonts for all numbers.
Negative Space: Use generous padding inside containers, but tight gaps between them.
Contrast: High contrast text (White on Dark Grey) for readability. No low-contrast grey-on-grey.

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors font-semibold px-6 py-2
buttons.secondary: border border-zinc-700 text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 transition-colors px-6 py-2

inputs.style: Flat, dark background, light border on focus
inputs.classes: bg-[#09090B] border border-[#27272A] focus:border-white focus:ring-0 text-white rounded-sm

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.motion: Micro-interactions only. Hover states on rows and buttons. No sweeping page transitions.

images.description: Gold coin close up for Coins section header or card
Bitcoin on white/clean surface for Crypto section
Abstract data lines for Stocks section or Hero background (low opacity)

steps: 1. Setup Fonts: Add Google Fonts imports to index.css
2. Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom color palette (Zinc-based) and font families.
3. Global CSS: Apply the dark theme variables in index.css. Ensure body background is #09090B.
4. Layout Structure: Create the Main Dashboard Layout using the 'Control Room' grid strategy.
5. Components: Customize Shadcn components (Card, Button, Input, Dialog, Table) to match the 'Matte Fintech' style (remove rounded-xl, use rounded-sm or none).
6. Features: Implement the Portfolio Overview, Crypto List, Stocks List, and Coins List (with scraping fields).
7. Charts: Use Recharts for the 'History' section. Style them with the accent colors defined above.
universal_rules: DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
ALWAYS use 'JetBrains Mono' for currency and percentage values.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Keep the UI 'Sober' - avoid unnecessary decorations.
